commit.message:
fix help for the --print option

Since 8285ab5c99, which was merged in with #38061, the help for the
--print option is missing the surrounding [ ] around the possible
options.

Signed-off-by: Doug Goldstein <cardoe@cardoe.com>

verification.payload:
tree a2346f60880aa574948f15e9d7a3e9329c4c5977
parent a68622c899883b9871b71d5ed600166e2254d230
author Doug Goldstein <cardoe@cardoe.com> 1483508650 -0600
committer Doug Goldstein <cardoe@cardoe.com> 1483508650 -0600

fix help for the --print option

Since 8285ab5c99, which was merged in with #38061, the help for the
--print option is missing the surrounding [ ] around the possible
options.

Signed-off-by: Doug Goldstein <cardoe@cardoe.com>

files.patch:
@@ -1182,7 +1182,8 @@ pub fn rustc_short_optgroups() -> Vec<RustcOptGroup> {
                               the compiler to emit",
                  "[asm|llvm-bc|llvm-ir|obj|metadata|link|dep-info]"),
         opt::multi_s("", "print", "Comma separated list of compiler information to \
-                               print on stdout", &print_opts.join("|")),
+                               print on stdout", &format!("[{}]",
+                               &print_opts.join("|"))),
         opt::flagmulti_s("g",  "",  "Equivalent to -C debuginfo=2"),
         opt::flagmulti_s("O", "", "Equivalent to -C opt-level=2"),
         opt::opt_s("o", "", "Write output to <filename>", "FILENAME"),
